    • Exploring temporal trends

    Exploring temporal trends

    Vignette Author

    2019-12-13

    exploring_time.Rmd

    Read data

    library(learningtower)
library(tidyverse)
data(student)

    Data exploration

    Australia

    student %>% 
  filter(country == "AUS") %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(math = weighted.mean(math, stu_wgt, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot() + 
    geom_line(aes(x=year, y=math)) +
    ylim(c(0,1000))

    All countries

    student %>% 
  group_by(year, country) %>%
  summarise(math = weighted.mean(math, stu_wgt, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot() + 
    geom_line(aes(x=year, y=math, group=country)) +
    ylim(c(250,800))

    # Uncomment this to make interactive
#library(plotly)
#ggplotly()
